label.heading: Sign in to ClinDCast
label.termsCond: By creating an account, you agree to the Terms of Service. For more information about ClinDCast's privacy practices, see the ClinDCast Privacy Statement. We'll occasionally send you account-related emails.

email.pattern: Email must be a valid email address.

password.minLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

api.accountNotActivated: You have not activated your account.Kindly activate your account or if you are unable to find activation mail you can reset your account.
api.accountReseted: You have reset your account.Kindly complete reset process or reinitiate reset process in order to login.
